text: Poison Mist
All Fimir Mearghs are accompanied by a noxious mist that demoralises and poisons their enemies. Skattach is no exception.
Summon Swamp Daemons
The caster opens a rift into the Realm of Chaos and binds a pack of Swamp Daemons to their will.
Staff of Balor's Eye

At the tip of this magical staff rests an ancient Fimir artifact known as "Balor's Eye" a magically preserved eye said to belong to the mysterious Fimir god, able to open a rift into the Realm of Chaos and suck all of the user's enemies within.
These unnatural creatures require magic to exist - the more the better. If the winds of magic blow strongly, they are more stable on the battlefield.
Magic Dependant
The Fimir will do anything for but a moment of attention from the Dark Gods. No act of bravery is too foolhardy, no act of cruelty too savage.
Under the Eyes of the Gods
The Great Eye is always watching
Under the stern gaze of Balor, the Fimir dare not waver in the face of the enemy.
Embodiment of Albion
Fen Hulks are embodiments of the corrupted lands of Albion. Wherever they go, the land is corrupted into muddy bogs which greatly hinder their enemies.
Fimir surround themselves with a magically-created mist, through which the Fimir are barely discernable from a distance of more than a few metres.
Mystic Mist
Summons a Bog Octopus Hatchling
Kroll will inoculate one of her spawn into a random enemy unit with low health, destroying it instantly
...and while she ate, she grew. She swelled, and her children, hungry for nourishment, flocked to her, and she fed unto each of them the corrupted remains of her victims...
Mother of a Thousand Young
Kroll has been known to force her eggs into the bodies of still her living but weakened victims. A fate much worse than death awaits those who receive her spawn inside them.
Broodmother
Empowered by the sacrifices of her children and the deaths on the battlefield, Kroll grows ever mightier, as do her devout followers.
Fulcrum of Worship
Bog Tendrils
Mutated tendrils have sprouted out of this creature's flesh and lash out at enemies.
